name: Fieldproxy
headline: Retool for 20 Million Field Teams
description:
Fieldproxy is Retool for Field Teams. Our no-code SaaS application allows organizations to build internal mobile applications to manage field teams of any size.

Fieldproxy's vision is to be the Operating System for Field teams.

founders.name: Swaroop Vijayakumar, Founder
founders.description: 2x enterpreneur, love solving problems for customers, IIM Kozhikode

founders.name: Balakrishna Balasubramanian, Founder
founders.description:
Worked across a variety of roles in software development, as expected of a tech co-founder.
Love working on new products and ideas. If it changes the world, great. If it doesn't, at least I'd have some fun.

generated_description:
**Fieldproxy Overview**

Founded in **2020** and part of **Y Combinator's Batch W22**, Fieldproxy is on a mission to become the ultimate operating system for field teams, described as "Retool for 20 Million Field Teams." Based in **Chennai, India**, the company has assembled a small yet efficient team of **15 employees**.

**What They Do**

Fieldproxy offers a **no-code SaaS application** that empowers organizations to create custom mobile applications for managing field teams of various sizes. Their platform streamlines remote operations and integrates features such as:

- **Custom Estimates**: Create intelligent estimates tailored to your services.
- **Dispatching & Scheduling**: Efficiently assign jobs to the right technicians.
- **Configurable Job Checklists**: Develop specific checklists for different job types.
- **Contracts & Invoices Management**: Centralize all contract and invoice activities.

Their vision is ambitious but clear: they aim to eliminate the chaos of manual field team management, replacing it with efficiency powered by their smart software solutions.

**Target Audience and Use Cases**

Fieldproxy primarily targets **commercial and residential service companies** that are striving to optimize operations. This includes industries such as FMCG, Pharma, Logistics, and Construction. They currently have over **450 companies** enjoying the streamlined benefits of their platform.

**AI Integration**

Fieldproxy has introduced AI agents named **Nora, Yori, and Max**. These agents handle scheduling, communications, and data retrieval tasks for users, dramatically improving productivity metrics. This approach helps businesses save on labor hours and enhances overall service quality.

**Client Success Stories**

The company boasts **7000+ installations across 48 countries**, highlighting its global reach and effectiveness. Notably, large organizations like **Prism Johnson** and **Qube Cinema** have utilized Fieldproxy to enhance operational efficiency.

**Conclusion**

Fieldproxy is shaping up as a formidable solution for companies bogged down by outdated field management practices. By leveraging no-code solutions and AI, they not only simplify workflows but also enable teams to focus on what truly matters—providing outstanding service and generating revenue.

For more information, you can visit their website [here](http://fieldproxy.com/).
